intro.title: Real-World GIVE Practice
intro.description: Practice GIVE in your daily conversations by consciously validating emotions and sending a thoughtful check-in to someone close to you. Notice how these approaches affect your connections.

sections.title: Practice Daily Validation
sections.instructions: In three different conversations today, consciously validate the other person's emotions or perspective. Record what you said and how they responded.

inputs.placeholder: What did you say to validate their feelings or perspective? (e.g., 'That sounds really frustrating' or 'I can see why that would be important to you')
How did they respond? What did you notice about the conversation?

inputs.label: Who will you reach out to?
inputs.instructions: Choose someone close to you - a friend, family member, or partner you want to connect with...

inputs.label: Write your GIVE-style check-in message
inputs.instructions: Use Gentle tone, show Interest in their life, Validate their experiences, and keep an Easy manner
inputs.placeholder: Example: 'Hi! I was thinking about you and wondering how you've been feeling lately. I know work has been stressful for you - how are you managing? I'd love to hear what's going on in your world. ❤️'

inputs.label: How did they respond?
inputs.instructions: What was their response? How did they seem to receive your message?

subsections.title: What did you notice about connection and responses?
subsections.prompt: Did people seem more open? Did conversations flow differently? How did it feel to use GIVE?

subsections.title: What challenges did you encounter?
subsections.prompt: Was it hard to remember to validate? Did any conversations feel awkward? What was difficult?

subsections.title: Which GIVE elements came most naturally? Which were hardest?
subsections.prompt: Gentle, Interested, Validate, Easy manner - which felt natural and which need more practice?

subsections.title: What would you do differently next time?
subsections.prompt: How could you improve your GIVE approach? What specific changes would you make?

subsections.title: How will you continue practicing GIVE?
subsections.prompt: What situations will you focus on? Who else might benefit from GIVE-style communication?
